Package Main

Class Doctor

Object
Doctor
public class Doctor extends Object
Represents a Doctor in the hospital management system. Provides functionality for managing appointments, viewing and updating patient medical records, and recording appointment outcomes. Utilizes various managers for appointment and medical record handling.
Since:
2024-11-6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tee Yu Xuan

  • Constructor Details

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(String userID, String userRole, Logger logger, dataReader reader, dataWriter writer)
      Constructs a Doctor object with the specified user information and data managers.
      Parameters:
      userID - the unique identifier for the doctor.
      userRole - the role of the user (expected to be "Doctor").
      logger - the logging utility for recording actions.
      reader - the data reader for retrieving information.
      writer - the data writer for saving information.

  • Method Details

    • menu

      public void menu()
      Displays the main menu for the doctor to perform various tasks. Logs the doctor's actions and processes menu choices in a loop.

    • viewPatientRecords

      private void viewPatientRecords()
      Views the medical records of a specific patient. Prompts the doctor for the patient ID. Logs the action and retrieves the record from the medical record manager.

    • updatePatientMedicalRecords

      private void updatePatientMedicalRecords()
      Updates the medical records of a specific patient. Prompts the doctor for the patient ID, new diagnosis, and treatment. Logs the update and sends the data to the medical record manager.

    • viewPersonalSchedule

      private void viewPersonalSchedule()
      Views the personal schedule of the doctor. Logs the action and retrieves the schedule from the appointment manager.

    • setAvailability

      private void setAvailability()
      Sets availability for appointment slots. Allows the doctor to update an existing slot or create a new one. Logs the action and updates the appointment slot manager.

    • manageAppointmentRequests

      private void manageAppointmentRequests()
      Manages appointment requests by allowing the doctor to accept or decline appointments. Prompts for appointment ID and decision, then logs the action and updates the appointment manager.

    • viewUpcomingAppointments

      private void viewUpcomingAppointments()
      Views all upcoming appointments for the doctor. Logs the action and retrieves the appointments from the appointment manager.

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      private void recordAppointmentOutcome()
      Records the outcome of an appointment. Prompts the doctor for details such as type of service, prescribed medication, and consultation notes. Logs the action and updates the appointment outcome manager.
